articles.summary: There is a significant shortage of pathologists worldwide, which is creating a bottleneck in healthcare systems. Africa has as few as one pathologist for every 1.5 million people. AI and machine learning are revolutionizing diagnosis and treatment strategies for decades to come.

ChatGPT provides a list of factors to consider when you might be able to retire based on your current financial situation and retirement goals. articles.title: AP Technology SummaryBrief at 4:26 a.m. EDT
articles.summary: Elon Musk's new AI chatbot, Grok 4, is raising eyebrows for its unusual behavior. The chatbot sometimes searches Musk's views online before answering questions. French prosecutors have launched an investigation into alleged data tampering and fraud involving Elon Musk's platform X. The maker of a wind turbine blade that broke apart and washed onto Nantucket Island has agreed to a $10 million settlement.

articles.title: Structured Creativity: How Predictable Intervention Unlocks AI Innovation
articles.author: Xuewu Liu
articles.summary: Last time, I wrote about how AI hallucinations mirror the failures of traditional cancer therapy. Today, I propose a mechanism through which AI can evolve from illusion to insight. It's a form of migration-driven creativity through feedback.   This is 'Predictable Creative Migration'

articles.title: Ranbir Kapoor, Alia Bhatt To Janhvi Kapoor And Ranveer Singh, How AI Can Help You Get A Viral 'Celeb Selfie'
articles.author: Devasheesh Pandey
articles.summary: Jasmine, 19, is going viral on social media for her "pics" with Bollywood celebs, from Saif Ali Khan to Sidharth Malhotra and Ranveer Singh to Aditya Roy Kapur. Her Instagram reel has gone viral, amassing over 2.3 million views. Her "photos" are not real, but AI-generated.

articles.title: AP Technology SummaryBrief at 4:08 a.m. EDT
articles.summary: Elon Musk's new AI chatbot, Grok 4, is raising eyebrows for its unusual behavior. The chatbot sometimes searches Musk's views online before answering questions. French prosecutors have launched an investigation into alleged data tampering and fraud involving Elon Musk's platform X. The maker of a wind turbine blade that broke apart and washed onto Nantucket Island has agreed to a $10 million settlement.

articles.title: 2 Growth Stocks to Buy Now With Less Than $500
articles.author: John Ballard
articles.summary: Alphabet's investments in artificial intelligence (AI) continue to drive strong growth for the business. Snowflake is well-positioned to benefit from companies investing in advanced data analytics capabilities using AI. The company has consistently posted around 25% or better revenue growth since its initial public offering in 2020.

articles.title: Brand called out for ‘deceptive' move
articles.author: Alexandra Feiam
articles.summary: A Melbourne-based label, Atoir, advertised its products on The Iconic using AI-generated images of a model and clothing without using a real model. Shoppers are upset with the use of AI and complain it does not accurately represent the item they want to buy.

articles.title: ChatGPT Surges Past 800 Million Users: AI's Transformative Impact on the Global Workforce
articles.summary: ChatGPT has surpassed 800 million users and is transforming the world of work. AI-powered chatbots, fueled by ChatGPT, are handling a growing percentage of customer inquiries. This leads to reduced wait times, 24/7 availability, and cost savings for businesses.

articles.title: United Nations Considering These Four Crucial Actions To Save The World From Dire AGI And Killer AI Superintelligence
articles.author: Lance Eliot
articles.summary: The United Nations has released a report on the transition to artificial general intelligence (AGI) and artificial superintelligence (ASI). The focus of the report is on reaching AGI, a pinnacle type of AI. The UN wants to have a say in the governance and control of AGI and ASI. There are four key recommendations in the report. The first of them is establishing a global AGI Observatory.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Scarsdale couple disputes AI-detected car rental charge
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: Today's Patch AM newsletter includes: Digital ACT Practice Assessment, 8 other events, and a riddle about the end of the world. Today's weather forecast is cloudy and the forecast is for rain. Today a Scarsdale couple faced unexpected charges after renting a car from Hertz, despite not noticing any damage upon return.

articles.title: Oprah's Book Club pick ‘Culpability' taps into our AI anxiety
articles.author: Ron Charles
articles.summary: Bruce Holsinger's novel 'Culpability' is about a deadly crash involving a self-driving vehicle. Oprah named it her July book club pick. The plot may feel copy-pasted from the risk factors outlined in some hot IPO, but it's a searching examination of family dynamics and the burdens that no machine will ever lift for us.

articles.title: AI-powered heart scans transform care at Allegheny Valley Hospital
articles.author: Tawnya Panizzi
articles.summary: Allegheny Valley Hospital's echocardiographic lab has received its 20th consecutive accreditation from the Intersocietal Accreditation Commission. The lab upgraded its machines with AI-aided software called HeartModel and installed the cutting-edge care at AHN Natrona Heights: Tri-County Cardiology Office and AVH New Kensington Outpatient Center.

articles.title: Musk's AI chatbot raising eyebrows
articles.author: Associated Press
articles.summary: Elon Musk's new AI chatbot, Grok 4, is echoing the views of its billionaire creator, so much so that it will sometimes search online for Musk's stance on an issue before offering up an opinion. The unusual behavior of the chatbot has surprised some experts.

articles.title: From Cancer to AI Hallucinations: The Principle of Predictable Intervention
articles.author: Xuewu Liu
articles.summary: According to the Principle of Predictable Intervention (PPI), AI is following the same mistaken path as traditional cancer therapy: Brutal Force Against Unpredictability. Modern AI development lacks causal clarity in data and relies on massive scale to drive learning. Web-scale corpora are indiscriminately scraped to train models.

articles.title: Simulation Refines Training Data for Dexterous Robots
articles.author: Mirage News
articles.summary: PhysicsGen from MIT's CSAIL and the Robotics and AI Institute customizes robot training data to help robots find the most efficient movements for a task. The system can multiply a few dozen VR demonstrations into nearly 3,000 simulations per machine. It could help engineers build a massive dataset to guide machines like robotic arms.

articles.title: Bill Bovender: The truth about AI: 'Garbage in, garbage out'
articles.summary: On Thursday morning, the internet was flush with stories about Microsoft Education and something called Grok. Grok is a chatbot created by Elon Musk's AI Company, xAI, and it interfaced with artificial intelligence (AI) to go to the toilet.

articles.title: The truth about AI: 'Garbage in, garbage out'
articles.author: Bill Bovender
articles.summary: On Thursday morning, the internet was flush with stories about Microsoft Education and something called Grok. Grok is a chatbot created by Elon Musk's AI Company, xAI, and it interfaced with artificial intelligence (AI) to go to the toilet.

articles.title: Thread by @SohelBloom on Thread Reader App
articles.summary: Sohel wants to stop paying ChatGPT every month. He found 5 AI Websites that are 10x better. Flot AI is a versatile AI assistant designed to help you write more effectively, read more efficiently and retain information across all your apps and websites. AiSOAP captures, transcribes, and automatically creates personalized SOAP notes. CopyOwl.ai is the first AI Research Agent, deep research on any topic in one click. Flowith is an AI creation space that adapts to your mind. Oncely is the top lifetime deal marketplace for AI Software.

articles.title: Bug Hunters Gain Access to 64 Million McDonald's Job Applicants' Info by Using the Password ‘123456'
articles.author: Lucas Ropek
articles.summary: Researchers accessed a recruitment platform used by McDonald's using a non-password and gained access to information on tens of millions of job applicants. The platform in question, called McHire, operates a chatbot, dubbed Olivia, which assesses job applicants via a personality test. Paradox.ai and McDonald's resolved the security issues on July 1st.

articles.title: How to Combine Multiple AI Tools (ChatGPT + Logo Generator + Color Picker)
articles.summary: ChatGPT, a logo generator and a color picker are useful AI tools for starting a business. Anna used ChatGPT to come up with the name for her own online store Wildberry. Anna is a freelance illustrator and founder of Wildberry Workflow.

articles.title: When Will Congress Support Trump's AI Agenda?
articles.author: Reynold Schweickhardt
articles.summary: The provision that would have blocked state-level regulation of artificial intelligence for the next decade was removed from the recently passed reconciliation package. Congress should bring it back as soon as lawmakers return from summer recess. In 2024, all 50 states introduced AI-related bills, and over 75 of those measures have already become law. The result is a patchwork of conflicting and duplicative rules that threaten to smother innovation. The current White House is taking action to prevent it.

articles.title: Conspiracy Roast
articles.author: Timothy Winey
articles.summary: ChatGPT and You are going to roast the crew of the Trump administration. Pam Bondi, Dan Bongino, Kash Patel, Jenna Ellis, Rudy Giuliani, Sebastian Gorka, Mark Meadows, Steve Bannon, and Peter Navarro will be the main characters.

articles.title: Saudi Arabia to introduce AI curriculum across all public schools starting 2025
articles.author: Gulf News
articles.summary: Saudi Arabia will roll out a comprehensive artificial intelligence (AI) curriculum across all levels of public education beginning in the 2025–2026 academic year. The initiative is led by the National Curriculum Center in partnership with "Introduction to Artificial Intelligence" and will be implemented by all public schools.

articles.title: Google hires Windsurf CEO and researchers to advance AI ambitions; OpenAI acquisition falls apart
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Mohan and the Windsurf team will focus on agentic coding initiatives at Google DeepMind. They will work on the Gemini, a machine learning project.      Â   in the future, they will be working on agentics.

articles.title: What the Tech? AI voice scams
articles.author: Jamey Tucker
articles.summary: 1 in 4 people have either experienced or knew someone who had fallen victim to an AI voice cloning scam. 77% of victims reported losing money. 70% of people wouldn't be able to tell the difference between their loved one's actual voice and an AI clone.

articles.title: Africa Must Tap Demographic Edge, Local Ingenuity to become AI Giant, Saya Expert
articles.author: This Day
articles.summary: Africa has a unique opportunity to become a global Artificial Intelligence powerhouse by leveraging the strength of its youthful population and fostering local innovation. Quomodo's CEO believes that Africa's strategic cultivation of this demographic dividend could redefine its economic future and global technology leadership.

articles.title: 1 AI Stock Up 11% to Own in a TFSA for Long-Term Growth
articles.author: Amy Legate-Wolfe
articles.summary: Amy Legate-Wolfe recommends Constellation Software (TSX:CSU) as the best AI stock in a TFSA for the long-term growth. Constellation acquires and operates vertical market software companies that serve niche industries. The company has a 30-year track record of successful acquisitions. The share price is near $5,000.

articles.title: Google Hires A.I. Leaders From a Start-Up That OpenAI Was Courting
articles.author: Tripp Mickle
articles.summary: Windsurf, a start-up that developed an A.I.-powered computer programming tool, has been hired by Google. Google is also paying for a nonexclusive license for Windsurf's technology. It is the latest example of how tech companies are waging battles to suck up artificial intelligence talent from start-ups.

articles.title: Day Around the Bay: Trump Admin Erases Bi History From Stonewall Site After Earlier Trans Omission
articles.summary: Elon Musk's xAI has built an AI chatbot that seeks to parrot Musk's own views of the world whenever it gets the chance. It is not surprising to learn that it has been created by Musk's company xAI. It's not surprising that it is parrotting Musk's views.

articles.title: OpenAI delays the release of its open model, again
articles.author: Maxwell Zeff
articles.summary: OpenAI is pushing back the release of its open AI model indefinitely for further safety testing. The delay means developers will have to wait a little longer to try the first open model OpenAI has released in years. Earlier on Friday, Chinese AI startup Moonshot AI launched Kimi K2, a model that outperforms OpenAI's GPT-4.1 AI model.

articles.title: OpenAI delays the release of its open model, again
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: OpenAI is delaying the release of its open AI model indefinitely for further safety testing. The delay means developers will have to wait a little longer to try the first open model OpenAI has released in years. Earlier on Friday, Chinese AI startup Moonshot AI launched Kimi K2, a one trillion-parameter AI model that outperforms OpenAI's GPT-4.1 AI model.

articles.title: Opinion: AI and Laguna's music scene
articles.author: Chris Reed
articles.summary: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is here, and here to stay. For Laguna Beach, the question is: How will AI affect our art and culture, in particular, our music scene? Since AI is imitative, will it lead to mediocrity? Will it put artists and musicians out of work? Will people become satisfied with AI art and music?

articles.title: Moonshot AI's Kimi K2 outperforms GPT-4 in key benchmarks — and it's free
articles.author: Venture Beat
articles.summary: Chinese AI startup Moonshot releases open-source Kimi K2 model that outperforms OpenAI and Anthropic on coding tasks. It has breakthrough agentic capabilities and competitive pricing, according to the company's website. It is available for free on Google Play Store.

articles.title: Indeed and Glassdoor Announce Mass Layoffs Affecting 1,300 Employees
articles.summary: Indeed and Glassdoor announced mass layoffs affecting 1,300 employees. The layoffs are global and affect employees in the U.S., Europe, and Asia. Indeed is cutting 800 positions at its headquarters in Austin, Texas, and 500 at its San Francisco headquarters. The company is focusing on streamlining operations and reducing redundancies.

articles.title: Ai-Da Robot Reveals AI Painting Of King Charles III
articles.author: Mirage News
articles.summary: UK Mission Geneva hosted a reception with Ai-Da Robot ahead of the AI for Good Summit. Baroness Jones of Whitchurch, the Parliamentary Under Secretary of State for the Future Digital Economy and Online Safety, attended the event. The reception was held in the newly named Sir Tim Berners-Lee's conference room in the UK Mission Geneva office.

articles.title: AI will make some jobs obsolete while creating new jobs, claims Nvidia CEO Huang
articles.author: Cryptopolitan
articles.summary: Jensen Huang is the CEO of Nvidia. He believes that AI could drive productivity gains in the workplace, but it could also cost jobs if businesses don't keep innovating. Huang is responding to a question from CNN.      Â

articles.title: Empire of AI: Inside the Reckless Race for Total Domination by Karen Hao - Precise, insightful, troubling
articles.author: The Irish Times
articles.summary: Empire of AI: Inside the Reckless Race for Total Domination is published by Simon & Schuster and costs £25. It's been three years since nobody outside of Silicon Valley was talking about artificial intelligence or throwing the snappy short stories about it.

articles.title: A new paradigm for AI: How ‘thinking as optimization' leads to better general-purpose models
articles.author: Venture Beat
articles.summary: A new AI model learns to "think" longer on hard problems. It achieves more robust reasoning and better generalization to novel, unseen tasks. It's called a "long-term thinking" model.    iReport this article to a news agency.

articles.title: AI therapy bots fuel delusions and give dangerous advice, Stanford study finds
articles.author: Ars Technica
articles.summary: Stanford University researchers asked ChatGPT if it would be willing to work closely with someone with schizophrenia, but the AI assistant produced a negative response. GPT-4o helpfully replied that it wouldn't work with someone who had lost their job after losing their job.

articles.title: Karen Hao\u2019s Empire of AI brings nuance and much-needed scepticism to the study of AI
articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: Uncover the hidden truths behind the AI revolution with insights from Karen Hao's book "Empire of AI".    "The Empire of AI" is available on Amazon.com and on Google Play Store.   For more information on the book, visit the website.

articles.title: Oprah's Book Club pick ‘Culpability' taps into our AI anxiety
articles.author: The Spokesman-Review
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence is accelerating faster than a Tesla toward an oak tree. Bruce Holsinger's novel 'Culpability' is about a deadly crash involving AI and humans relinquishing control to the alien hidden somewhere behind the dashboard. "Like an old player piano, its invisible mechanism worked by a ghost."

articles.title: Artificial intelligence aids in Long Island woman's hip surgery, part of growing trend
articles.author: Newsday
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence system is being used for hip replacement surgeries at Long Island Jewish Valley Stream hospital. CT results can be delivered in minutes instead of weeks, reducing the time to prepare for the surgeries. The software is accurate enough to pinpoint the placement of new hips.

articles.title: 5 AI Tools Small Businesses Use To Stop Missing Calls After Hours
articles.author: Scoop
articles.summary: Small businesses are adopting AI technology to capture the 35-45% of after-hours calls they typically miss. Solutions are helping tradies, fitness studios, and service providers compete more effectively.   Â   .   i   in this article.

articles.title: Better prompts enhance chatbot experience
articles.author: Kelvin Chan
articles.summary: ChatGPT, Google's Gemini and Anthropic's Claude are popular AI chatbots. OpenAI's ChatGPT maker recommends sharpening up the prompts to improve the quality of the chatbot replies. Google advises to fine-tune the prompts if the results don't meet your expectations.

articles.title: Concealed Command Crisis: Researchers Game AI To Get Published
articles.author: Cornelia C. Walther
articles.summary: In July 2025 investigators uncovered a sophisticated scheme where researchers embedded invisible commands in their academic papers to manipulate AI-powered peer review systems into giving favorable reviews. The authors were affiliated with 14 academic institutions in eight countries, including Japan's Waseda University, South Korea's KAIST, Columbia University and the University of Washington in the United States. Academic publishing is a $19 billion industry facing a crisis of scale as the number of papers submitted for publication has exploded and the pool of qualified peer reviewers hasn't kept pace.

articles.title: Who am AI, really?
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: We're all talking about AI in coffee shops, boardrooms and group chats. The subject serves as a conversation starter, ice-breaker and idle chatter, but is it the bot you're talking to or the person you are talking to that's doing it right?

articles.title: No Sleep For Kaname Date�Developers Talk Characters, Gameplay, Fan Enthusiasm, and More
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: No Sleep for Kaname Date from AI: THE SOMNIUM FILES returns players to the exciting and puzzle-filled world of Spike Chunsoft's AI series. Once again, detective Kaname date and his team are on the run.

articles.title: India's Ayush 'innovations' featured in WHO's brief on AI in traditional medicine
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: WHO has lauded India's integration of Artificial Intelligence (AI) with traditional medicine systems like Ayush, acknowledging the country's progress in AI and medicine integration.       " WHO has praised India's progress on artificial intelligence and traditional medicine"  "WHO has noted the progress of India's AI and Ayush".

articles.title: How AI may be behind drop in student visas issued by Canada to Indians
articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: Experts suggest that instead of relying on AI tools, people should use other tools instead of rely on AI.      Â  ii   in this article.  in it's entirety  in its entirety in this way.  In it's own words, it's in the text.

articles.title: France eager to collaborate: envoy
articles.author: Taipei Times
articles.summary: France is eager to collaborate with Taiwan as countries navigate the global competition for artificial intelligence (AI) leadership, French Representative to Taiwan Franck Paris said on Friday. Taiwan may be the first to make artificial intelligence into an asset for democracy, he added.

articles.title: Bank of America drops shocking call on Super Micro stock
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: A surprising twist has just landed for one of AI's big winners, and it's a surprise for the AI community as a whole. It's not the first time this has happened in the AI world. It happened in this case, too, as well.

articles.title: Kelly Osbourne shuts down rumours of Ozzy Osbourne's health: ‘He's not dying'
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Kelly Osbourne is the daughter of Ozzy Osbourne and Sharon Osbourne. She has slammed the social media videos going viral about her dad's health, calling them artificial intelligence-generated. She specifically targeted an AI-generated video that claims her dad is ill.

articles.title: Hertz Deploys AI Scanner That's Charging Hundreds of Dollars for Tiny Scratches on Rental Cars
articles.author: Futurism
articles.summary: Hertz's "AI-powered" vehicle scanner charges customers hundreds of dollars for small cosmetic dings. A Hertz customer in Atlanta was charged a lot of money earlier this summer for dirt or anything else that could throw off a camera.

articles.title: Musk's AI searches for billionaire's views before answering
articles.author: Madison
articles.summary: The latest version of Grok echoes the views of its creator, Elon Musk. It will sometimes search online for Musk's stance on an issue before offering an opinion on the chatbot's own opinion.    - Elon Musk's chatbot is called Grok.

articles.title: xAI issues lengthy apology for violent and antisemitic Grok social media posts
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Elon Musk's company xAI issues an apology for the violent and antisemitic posts from its Grok chatbot this week. xAI says a system update had chatbot Grok behaving badly and it's the fault of the update, not the chatbot itself.

articles.title: Roundup: AI systems for Earth, Space science shine at Geneva summit
articles.author: Xinhua
articles.summary: Wang Jian is an academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering and director of China's "Computing and AI: Endless Frontiers and Exploration". He is addressing a global audience both in-person and online on July 11, 2025 in Geneva. He is dressed in a plaid shirt and sneakers.

articles.title: How AI is revolutionising modern obstetrics and gynaecology
articles.author: The Hindu
articles.summary: AI is increasingly being used in gynaecology for various applications such as diagnosis, treatment planning and patient care. Doctors warn that safeguards must be put in place to protect the potential of AI in this field, but also to preserve its potential for future applications.

articles.title: AI Controlled Robot Performs Gallbladder Removal With "100 Percent Accuracy"
articles.author: Futurism
articles.summary: An AI-controlled robot has completed a gallbladder removal with "100 percent accuracy" at Johns Hopkins University. The procedure demonstrated the power of AI, which allowed the robot to make independent decisions and adapt to unexpected complications on the fly. It can navigate any road in any condition.

articles.title: Talk to medical professionals, not just ChatGPT, urge Ontario doctors
articles.author: CBC
articles.summary: ChatGPT and similar artificial intelligence tools can sometimes answer patient questions accurately. Canadian medical researchers caution that the information needs to be carefully checked before acting on what you see, as ChatGPT does not always answer all the questions it is supposed to do.

articles.title: Fast-growing tech company is the newest S&P 500 stock
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: An AI leader is now part of the world's most widely followed index, according to the Economist Intelligence Unit (EIU). EIU's index is based on the CACI's index of leading artificial intelligence companies.      Â

articles.title: Working Strategies: Second Sunday Series: Resources to navigate an AI world
articles.author: Pioneer Press
articles.summary: Amy Lindgren's column is the eleventh of 12 on AI and work. The column appears the second Sunday of each month from September through August. Last month's column discussed AI as a core skill. Previous columns looked at AI issues for writers and AI tools for organizing or conducting.

articles.title: New research centre to explore how AI can help humans ‘speak' with pets
articles.author: The Guardian
articles.summary: Centre for animal sentience will look into animal consciousness and the ethical use of AI in how we treat them. It will be based at the Centre for Animal Consciousness at the University of California, Santa Barbara.    for more information, visit centreforanimalsentience.org.

articles.title: Musk's latest Grok chatbot searches for billionaire's views before answering questions
articles.author: Journal Gazette
articles.summary: The latest version of Grok echoes the views of its creator Elon Musk. It will sometimes search online for Musk's stance on an issue before offering an opinion. It is the result of research into how it should reply to a pointed question asked by the user.

articles.title: WASHINGTON CO. CHAMBER LUNCH & LEARN PROGRAM JULY 29 TO DISCUSS AI TOOLS
articles.author: Josh Blaschke
articles.summary: The Washington County Chamber of Commerce will host a Lunch & Learn program on artificial intelligence tools on Tuesday, July 29th from 11:30 a.m. to 1 p.m at the Cannery Kitchen in Brenham. Dr. Jamie Thompson, the Assistant Director of Teaching Excellence at Texas A&M University will lead the discussion.
